card_name: Dai Gui, Pillar of Sea and Sky
special_text:
[i](Transcend as a sorcery to gain that type and a +1/+1 counter.)[/i]
When Dai Gui enters, create a 1/1 green and blue Bird creature token with flying and “{T}: Add one mana of any color.”
{X}{X}{G}{U}: Demigod
You gain X life and you draw X cards. X can't be 0.
{X}{X}{G}{U}: God
Put up to X creature cards from your hand onto the battlefield.
